case_title: NAWAB GHAZI JUNG vs ASSISTANT CONTROLLER OF ESTATE DUTY, HYDERABAD

parties.respondent: Assistant Controller of Estate Duty, Hyderabad

judgment_summary.main_issue: Interpretation of Section 70(2) of the Estate Duty Act regarding payment in instalments.
judgment_summary.court_ruling: The first instalment date is based on the notice under Section 73(1) or the statutory date under Section 73(2), not the date of death.
judgment_summary.interest_rate: 4% per annum as prescribed in Section 70(2)

additional_matters.pending_appeal: Jagir commutation amount of Rs. 75,213 under appeal to Appellate Controller at Delhi.
additional_matters.stay_request: Stay of collection denied; petitioner advised to approach Assistant Controller under Section 73(4).
